mapper.select: SELECT u.*, count.totalCount as blogCount, count.weekCount as weekCount, count.monthCount as monthCount FROM cc_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.user_id, COUNT(*) AS totalCount, SUM(YEARWEEK(b.create_date, 1) = YEARWEEK(NOW(), 1)) AS weekCount, SUM(DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')) AS monthCount FROM cc_blog b GROUP BY b.user_id ) AS count ON u.id = count.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id};
